channel.title: Cachedownloader put it wrong in C: Drive
channel.description:
My cachedownloader is putting my cache wrong in my C:// drive :s
when he download client to my C:// he automaticly add a other map in that cache and put all models in there... ;s
so client wont load that :|
can someone help me with this
*EXAMPLE* it has to be this C:/Lostlegacy/Raw
and he is doing this C:/Lostlegacy/Lostlegacy/Raw
and the client only looking for models in the C:/Lostlegacy/raw map,
but the cachedownloader is putting it in wrong,
ofc i know i just have to cut and paste the files in the first map, but allot of my coming server users wont so how can i fixx this

item.title: Cachedownloader put it wrong in C: Drive
item.dc:creator: @oldschool-scape oldschool-scape
item.description:
@oldschool-scape wrote:

if there a second Link in the cachedownloader?
